title: Directory navigation
text:
getwd()

[1] "D:/MY FILES/Projects/Public/code-snippets/basics"


Setting the working directory

setwd("..") # Move up dir tree
setwd("basics") # Set WD in tree
getwd()

[1] "D:/MY FILES/Projects/Public/code-snippets/basics"



dir() # List contents

[1] "data_structures.html"     "data_structures.qmd"     
[3] "dir_navigation.qmd"       "dir_navigation.rmarkdown"
[5] "if_statements.qmd"

title: About
text:
Reference R code snippets built up while learning R. Might also add some Python in future.

title: Data structures
text: An overview of R data structures.

title: Data structures
text:
Indexing vectors

my_vec[1]

[1] 1

my_vec[1:3]

[1] 1 2 3

my_vec[1:length(my_vec)]

[1] 1 2 3 4

my_vec[c(1,3,4)] # Select specific indicies

[1] 1 3 4

title: Data structures
text:
Assigning names

names(my_vec) <- c('head_1', 'head_2', 'head_3', 'head_4')
my_vec

head_1 head_2 head_3 head_4 
     1      2      3      4 

my_vec['head_1']

head_1 
     1

title: Data structures
text:
Indexing dfs

my_df$col1

[1] 1 2 2

my_df[1:2, 'col1']

[1] 1 2

my_df[1:nrow(my_df), c('col1','col3')]

  col1 col3
1    1    5
2    2    6
3    2    6

subset(my_df, col2>3) # Select rows based on condition

  col1 col2 col3
2    2    4    6
3    2    4    6

title: Data structures
text:
Indexing lists
Various ways to select all elements in first item of the list:

my_list[[1]] # Or my_list[['item1']], or my_list$item1

head_1 head_2 head_3 head_4 
     1      2      3      4 


Select elements within list items:

my_list[[2]][1]

  col1
1    1
2    2
3    2

my_list[[2]]$col1

[1] 1 2 2

my_list[[2]][1:2, 'col1'] # etc

[1] 1 2

title: If statements
